page.title: 02Southend:Entertainment
page.content: In this area,there are many varying types of{entertainment.}The most popular of these are the amusement arcades,which are situated on the {Golden Mile,}the main part of the seafront.There are just under 20 of these.In the town itself,there are 2 cinemas,3 discos and 2 night-clubs. Three{centres}cater for many sports including tennis,squash and swimming.Parks provide facilities for field sports like football,hockey and cricket. Along the{seafront}there are 2 yacht clubs and a marine activities centre,where it is possible to learn canoeing,board sailing and yachting. There are several playgrounds with many rides which are very popular with the children.
